system.description: Look for subtext, motives, or threats in a situation or person.
system.detail: Look for subtext, motive, or threat in a situation or person, often social situations. Use your intuition to learn someoneâ€™s motivation, learn who is really in charge, or who is about to do something rash or stupid. Get a gut feeling about a situation or person. Sense if someone is lying to you.
